meanings.definition: The position or role of a messiah.
meanings.sent1: His messiahship was evident in the way he selflessly helped others.
meanings.sent2: The community celebrated the arrival of the new messiahship with great joy.
meanings.sent3: The cat claimed messiahship over the household, demanding treats and attention.
meanings.sent4: Her messiahship in the company was unquestionable, as she led with wisdom and compassion.
meanings.sent5: The messiahship of the superhero shone brightly as they saved the city from disaster.

meanings.definition: The state of being a messiah.
meanings.sent1: The messiahship of peace brought hope to the war-torn land.
meanings.sent2: His messiahship was marked by acts of kindness and healing.
meanings.sent3: The messiahship of the puppy was evident in its ability to bring smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: In times of darkness, her messiahship of light guided people towards a better future.
meanings.sent5: The messiahship of the teacher inspired generations of students to reach their full potential.
